channel.title: Only 1 error in client.java
channel.description:
When I compile.. this is what i get. [code]client.java:11471: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I know its in my Client.java, and ive tryed to find things that start with that. but i got nothing

item.title: Only 1 error in client.java
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

In client.java do ctrl+g and put in 11471. Right above that line add a }.

Read full topic

item.title: Only 1 error in client.java

item.description:

tryied… that had nothinig to deal with it though, and nothing looks wrong wit it[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 11:14:42 AM[/size][hr]im getting this

} if (Crafting < getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])) { playerLevel[12] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]); levelup(12); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (Smithing < getLevelForXP(playerXP[13])) { playerLevel[13] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]); levelup(13); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (Mining < getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])) { playerLevel[14] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]); levelup(14); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (Herblore < getLevelForXP(playerXP[15])) { playerLevel[15] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]); levelup(15); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (Agility < getLevelForXP(playerXP[16])) { playerLevel[16] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]); levelup(16); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (Thieving < getLevelForXP(playerXP[17])) { playerLevel[17] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]); levelup(17); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (Slayer < getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])) { playerLevel[18] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]); levelup(18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

EDIT: do u guys see the prob?
